content: 2tr ch2 sk2 10tr then * ch2 sk2 2tr 2 times ch2 sk2 10tr 1 time repeat from * until there are 9 stitches left row 49 then ch2 sk2 2tr ch2 sk2 3tr ch3 counts as stitch 4tr then ch2 sk2 2tr ch2 sk2 6tr * ch2 sk2 2tr 3 times ch2 sk2 6tr 1 time repeat from * until there are 11 stitches left row 50 then ch2 sk2 2tr ch2 sk2 5tr row 51 ch3 counts as stitch 2tr then *ch2 sk2 2tr repeat from * until last 5 stitches 5tr row 52* ch3 counts as stitch 4tr then *ch2 sk2 2tr repeat from * until last 5 stitches 5tr row 53 make 1tr in each chain to the end of the row 308 stitches *note if you have got to this point and have nearly run out of yarn you can miss this row 52 without ruining the pattern too much you can t miss the last row though hopefully you won t have done though rough diamonds rectangular shawl page 17 of 17 © joanna hardy 2017 all rights reserved you may not reproduce or sell this pattern in any form
